body: can someone please explain step by step how to fix user name has white space error in ladybug.

replies.body: Hi Kelvin. I think you've already found the answer in the [other discussion](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ladybug-white-space-user-folder?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1216126&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987). For future reference all you need to do is to connect a panel to Ladybug_Ladybug input and indicate a new address. [](http://api.ning.com/files/5uACgY*tajvfrZEICdakT-ibyWC7OsAOZigL3NsTyrVb9O1A1UTUNsvqj9gG64r-8YAIja6Oi1-HsTSScXBDQutBtgHDAZec/defaultFolder.png)
